DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator wonder whether association high frequency repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation ( hf-rTMS ) manual therapy ( peripheral central approach ) effective reduce pain level modulation cortical activity chronic knee ostearthritis pain subject manual therapy alone ( usual peripheral approach ) . For purpose , patient include submit one session active sham hf-rTMS follow protocol manual therapy . Besides another active group sequence intervention exchange ( manual therapy follow hf-rTMS ) order investigate whether may influence final outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Associated With Manual Therapy Knee Ostearthritis Pain
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis knee OA ; Absence severe cognitive deficiency verify Mini Mental State Examination ; Meet American College Rheumatology criterion idiopathic knee osteoarthritis . Individuals diagnose osteoporosis , fibromyalgia neurological disease ; Had opioid corticosteroid injection last 30 day ; Modified chronic pain medication last month participate study ; History knee surgery last six month ; Obese ; Contraindications use noninvasive brain stimulation , : metal implant face skull , history seizure , cochlear implant .
